    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBuildNewIndexEntries()
      Will add reindex enteries for all content on all servers in the cluster including this one It will also add an entry telling other servers to start building a new index
      void addCacheEntry(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String group)
      Will add cache entries for all servers other then himself in the process table
      void addStructureReindexEntries(T structureInode)
      This method will add all content identifier for a structure to the index
      boolean areRecordsLeftToIndex()
      Will determine if either the process table or journal table have any records left for the local server to index
      void cleanDistReindexJournal() 
      void deleteLikeJournalRecords(IndexJournal<T> ijournal)
      Will delete all records with the same identifer, serverid, and where they exist in the inode table
      void deleteReindexEntryForServer(IndexJournal<T> ijournal)
      Deletes the specific build new index entry for the local server.
      void deleteReindexEntryForServer(java.util.List<IndexJournal<T>> recordsToDelete) 
      void distReindexJournalCleanup(int time, boolean add, boolean includeInodeCheck, DistributedJournalAPI.DateType type)
      Deletes Records older or greater than d day(s), minutes(s) from dist_reindex_journal
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> findCacheEntriesToRemove()
      Will return only the entries for the specific server the code is executed on This method will also delete all entries from the table that are returned in the select
      java.util.List<IndexJournal<T>> findContentReindexEntriesToReindex()
      Will return only the reindex entries for the specific server the code is executed on This method will also delete all entries from the table that are returned in the select
      java.lang.String getServerId() 
      boolean isIndexationEnabled()
      Return whether distribuited indexation is enabled (records are being inserted in the database)
      void processJournalEntries()
      Moves/process records from the dist_process table to the dist_journal table for all servers
      long recordsLeftToIndexForServer()
      Will find the number of records left to index on this server
      long recordsLeftToIndexForServer(java.sql.Connection conn) 
      void refreshContentUnderFolder(Folder folder)
      Reindexes content under a given folder
      void refreshContentUnderHost(Host host)
      Reindexes content under a given host
      void setIndexationEnabled(boolean indexationEnabled)
      Sets whether distribuited indexation is enabled or not (records are being inserted in the database)
      java.util.List<IndexJournal> viewReindexJournalData()
